item.title: Galaxy Digital has withdrawn 37,808 ETH from CEX in the past 24 hours, equivalent to around $172 million
item.description: Update: On August 15th, as per TheDataNerd, within the past 24 hours, Galaxy Digital withdrew a combined total of 37,808 ETH from exchanges. This amount is approximately equivalent to $172 million.

item.title: Ethereum Treasury and ETF Total Holdings Surpass 10 Million Coins, Accounting for 8.3% of ETH's Current Total Supply
item.description: On August 15th, according to strategicethreserve data, the combined total holdings of Ethereum by treasury companies and ETFs have exceeded 10 million, accounting for approximately 8.3% of the current total supply. The top holders among treasury companies and institutions are as follows:Bitmine Immersion Tech (BMNR) takes the lead and currently holds 1.2 million ETH, with a value of around $5.33 billion;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) comes in second and currently holds 598,800 ETH, valued at around $2.77 billion;The Ether Machine (DYNX) ranks third and currently holds 345,000 ETH, with a value of around $1.6 billion;The Ethereum Foundation ranks fourth and holds 231,600 ETH, valued at around $1.07 billion.

item.title: China's Central Bank: Implementing and Detailing a Moderately Loose Monetary Policy
item.description: August 15: The People's Bank of China issued the China Monetary Policy Implementation Report for the second quarter of 2025. In the subsequent stage, a moderately loose monetary policy will be implemented and refined. Based on the domestic and international economic and financial situation and the operation of the financial market, we will control the strength and pace of policy implementation, maintain liquidity, ensure that the scale of social financing and the amount of money supply increase in line with economic growth and the expected target of the overall price level, and continuously create a suitable financial environment. Regarding promoting a reasonable rise in prices, it is regarded as an important factor in guiding monetary policy and driving prices to remain at a reasonable level. (FX678)

item.title: Big Candle Capital experienced a daily drawdown of approximately $24.495 million, regaining $20.675 million in profits.
item.description: On August 15th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the data from the Binance platform indicates that the crypto venture capital firm Big Candle Capital witnessed a single-day asset drawdown of approximately $24.495 million yesterday. Prior to this, on the Binance platform, Big Candle Capital had a 30-day profit of $114 million.Based on her analysis, this might be due to holding positions during yesterday's significant market decline or partially reducing positions. The profit and loss curve for the past 7 days shows that on August 13th, the profit reached a peak of $20.675 million, but yesterday the profit quickly turned into a negative value (-$3.82 million).

item.title: Tether Treasury Mints 1 Billion USDT on Ethereum Chain
item.description: On August 15th, as monitored by Whale Alert, the Tether Treasury minted 1 billion USDT on the Ethereum blockchain approximately 4 minutes ago.

item.title: BtcTurk's Suspicious Withdrawals Reach Around $54 Million
item.description: On August 15th, as monitored by CertiK Alert, the suspicious withdrawals from the Turkish cryptocurrency exchange BtcTurk have surged to approximately $54 million.Yesterday, BtcTurk issued a statement indicating that abnormal hot wallet operations were detected. As a preventive measure, the platform has temporarily halted cryptocurrency deposits and withdrawals until the investigation is completed. The official announcement mentioned that the majority of assets are stored in secure cold wallets, the company's finances are in good condition, and user assets are not impacted. The functions of Turkish Lira deposits, withdrawals, and trading are operating normally. The platform has notified the regulatory authorities and implemented all security measures.

item.title: BIT Mining has released its financial performance for the first half of the year, holding $3.6 million in cryptocurrency assets
item.description: On August 15th, BIT Mining Limited (BTCM) presented its unaudited financial results for the six-month period ending June 30th. The half-year revenue amounted to $11 million (mainly consisting of $4.6 million from its self-mining operations and $6.4 million from its data center business), representing a 43.3% decline.The company holds a combined total of $3.6 million in cryptocurrency assets, which include 7.3 BTC, 808 ETH, 1.8 million DOGE, 300,000 USDT, and various other cryptocurrency holdings. These assets mainly stem from the company's cryptocurrency mining business.

item.title: ALT5 Sigma Appoints Former GSR Executive as Chief Financial Officer
item.description: On August 15th, ALT5 Sigma (ALTS), a US-listed company that obtained a $1.5 billion financing to initiate the WLFI Treasury, declared the appointment of Jonathan Hugh as the Chief Financial Officer. Jonathan holds more than 25 years of senior financial and business leadership experience in digital assets, technology, energy, and commodity trading. He has previously held the position of CFO at global market maker GSR International and institutional custody company Zodia Custody.

item.title: Analysis: Strategy Set to Be Included in S&P 500 in September, Bitcoin's Leap to Blue-Chip Asset Status Is Underway
item.description: On August 15th, the asset management company Strive released a market commentary on Strategy. It was stated that Strategy, as the world's largest Bitcoin treasury company, is one step away from being included in the S&P 500 Index. If this milestone is achieved, it will fundamentally establish Bitcoin's position in the US financial landscape. The market value of Strategy exceeds $100 billion, already surpassing the market capitalization threshold of the S&P 500. However, the inclusion criteria for the S&P 500 are not only based on market capitalization but also require the company to be registered in the US, listed on a major exchange, and to have been profitable in the past quarter and year. The latter profitability requirement has always been a barrier for Strategy.Recently, Strategy released its second-quarter financial report, and its profitability over the past 12 months has overcome the final hurdle, making it possible to be included in the S&P 500 as early as September. However

item.title: Market Pullback Affects Meme Coins, CLIPPY, SPARK, TROLL Drop Over 30% from Monthly Highs
item.description: On August 15th, according to GMGN data, affected by today's overall downturn in the cryptocurrency market, recently popular meme coins have generally shifted from gains to losses. Among them:The market capitalization of TROLL has fallen from last week's peak of $240 million to $165 million, a drop of more than 31%, and it is currently priced at $0.164;The market capitalization of SPARK has halved from a high of $66 million to $30 million, and it is currently priced at $0.03;The market capitalization of CLIPPY has shrunk by 43% from a peak of $30 million to $17 million, and it is currently trading at $0.017.BlockBeats reminds users that meme coins often lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility, and investment should be approached with caution.
